Primary Domain: Building agent-based market simulation models for price forecasting of real-world stocks and other securities
License: Proprietary; free evaluation version available for research and experimentation (some limitations but no expiration)
Programming Language: No programming skills required. An adaptive form of genetic programming is used to create trading rules. User can select functions to be used in the genetic programming engine.
Operating System: Windows 2000  NT 4.0  XP  Vista  7  8 or any other platform that supports Microsoft .Net 2.0 or higher
User Support: FAQ  documentation  tutorial  examples  forum  email support
3D Capabilities: {{yes}} Up to 3 agent properties can be visualized in real-time using 2D graphics and color

Primary Domain: Teaching simulation to grades K–12 in social studies  mathematics  sciences  and social sciences
Programming Language: Visual AgenTalk; can be exported to Java;
Operating System: Windows; Mac OS X; should run on any Java Virtual Machine
User Support: Manuals; tutorial movies; FAQ; recommended readings on programming and simulation; personal contact with developers; elementary school training; teacher guides

Primary Domain: Agent-based general purpose; also supports discrete event and system dynamics simulations.
Supporting Organization: The AnyLogic Company; Oakbrook Terrace  Illinois  USA
License: Proprietary; Free Personal Learning Edition available
Operating System: AnyLogic Model development environment is Java and Eclipse based application and has been tested on the following platforms: Microsoft Windows 10  x64; Microsoft Windows 8  x64; Microsoft Windows 7 SP1  x64; Apple Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite) or later  Universal; SuSE Linux  x64 (with installed GTK+  libwebkitgtk-1.0-0  libudev  libssl 0.9.8 and newer); Ubuntu Linux 10.04 or above  x64 (with installed GTK+  libwebkitgtk-1.0-0  libudev  libssl 0.9.8 and newer); Linux Mint 17 or above  x64 (with installed GTK+  libwebkitgtk-1.0-0  libudev  libssl 0.9.8 and newer)
User Support: Demos; training; online community; ask a question; online help; tutorials; consulting services
GIS Capabilities: {{yes}}: supports both tile maps from free online providers and shapefile-based maps

Primary Domain: Multi-agent systems; highly distributed  scalable  reliable  survivable applications; Domain independent; large scale distributed  complex  data intensive (can be configured for small-scaled embedded applications)
Supporting Organization: Cougaar Software Inc.; Vienna  Virginia  USA].
License: Cougaar Open Source License (COSL) is a modified version of the OSI approved BSD License
Operating System: Windows 98; Windows NT; Windows XP; Linux; Mac OS X; and Java-1.4-capable PDAs
User Support: FAQ; tutorials; slide shows; documentation; selected references; email support; public forums; mailing lists
